art.author: ezekiel
art.post: Just remember in the last days Jesus’ warned about those that would say “There’s the Messiah” or ” here’s the Christ”…dont be deceived and chase after idols ,images or depictions…The TRue Form of Yeshua will be revealed in God’s time. The bible really never gives a physical description for reasons. Jesus want us to be able to identify Him by His voice. The sheep knows His “voice” is what He says in scripture. The tricky devil can come as an angel of light to fool you and use a  4 year old child to deceive many who wouldn’t dare question an innocent child. Just beware and know the Word
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
